footnote1.value:
The Payments for property plant and equipment and the Payments for intangible assets cannot be directly reconciled to
the Note 12 Transfers and capital expenditure and Note 15 Additions, because the latter one contains non-material, non-
cash addition of the assets, including transfers.

footnote2.value:
Cash and cash equivalents at end of year cannot be reconciled directly to Cash and cash equivalents of the Consolidated
Balance sheet due to year end figure of Cash and cash equivalents did not contain the total cash of held for sale companies.
